register.done: `{{fmUsername}}`, got it. You have been registered!
register.linked: You have a last.fm account linked to this account. If you want to change your username, use the `/unlinkfm` command first.

unlink.done: Your last.fm account has been unlinked.
unlink.notLinked: You don't have a last.fm account linked to this account.

help.text:
👋 Howdy. lastgram is a bot for last.fm users, allowing them to interact with the service through Telegram.

News, updates and more: https://t.me/lastgramdaily
Support and vibes: https://t.me/lastgramsupport

Use `/help <command>` to get more information about a command.
help.notFound: Command not found. Check the spelling and try again.
help.commandInfo:
Information for the **{{name}}** command
{{description}}

Usage: `{{- usage}}`

*Arguments between `< >` are required, while arguments between `[ ]` are optional.*

linkfm.link: To link your account, click on the button below. After connecting your last.fm account, click on the *$t(core:buttons.done)* button.
linkfm.success: Hey, `{{username}}`! Your last.fm account has been linked successfully.
linkfm.linkingError: Sorry, an error occurred while linking your account. Please try again.
linkfm.successWithUsername: Hey, `{{username}}`! Your last.fm account has been linked successfully, but the username you've set on the bot didn't match. I've set it to `{{username}}`, which is your real one.

config.donate: If you like the bot and want to donate to support its development, you can do so by clicking on the button below. Thank you!
